title: Gossip Girl star Ed Westwick's new stunning model girlfriend Tamara Francesconi is revealed
text:

Ed Westwick has found love again with model Tamara Francesconi, a year after his split from American actress Jessica Serfaty.

The South African born beauty has captured attention in her own right as she has built up an empire of 31.5K followers on Instagram .

Tamara, 28, peppers her social media account with her ultra glam lifestyle as she lives out her days jetting off to cool locations and modelling by the poolside.

Not slowing down, the model revealed she was in Los Angeles but planned to make the trip to New York City and then onto London in the weeks to come.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The brunette bombshell is signed up as a model to agency The Circle and she uses her social media to showcase her best work.

Despite being an avid social media user, she is yet to make her romance with Ed Instagram official.

Their romance came to light earlier this week as they were pictured for the first time having lunch with Ed's mum at Mel's Diner in West Hollywood.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

It's claimed Tamara is already "head over heels" in love with Ed and he is proud to show her off to the world as his girlfriend.

The couple have been swept up in the romance already as they have been dating for a number of weeks, according to reports.

A source told The Sun : “Tamara’s head over heels with him and Ed is proud to tell everyone Tamara is his girlfriend.

“His friends and family all approve and think they’re a great match.”

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

His new budding romance comes after he was cleared of sexual assault allegations.

The actor was accused of rape by two women and sexual assault by a third, claims he vehemently denied the allegations.

Westwick was cleared last summer when prosecutors in Los Angeles decided against pursuing the matter due to lack of evidence.

When the claims first emerged, his career appeared to be in jeopardy as he was cut from BBC Agatha Christie drama Ordeal of Innocence while he was being investigated.

(Image: BBC)

The drama had been completed when news of the probe surfaced, so the scenes he was in were re-shot with another actor, Christian Cooke.

It delayed the show by several months - it had been due to air over Christmas 2017, but it got bumped until Easter 2018 to allow for the reshoots.

At the time the charges against Westwick were dropped, the actor's lawyer, Blair Berk, issued a statement, saying: "The evidence was clear from the start that each of the allegations made by these three women were absolutely untrue.

"It is a shame there are those who prejudged this case and that it took over 8 months for Ed to be officially cleared of all of these charges.

"I hope that those who made such quick judgment here not knowing anything about the abundant evidence of innocence in this case will hesitate next time before they so publicly accuse someone who has committed no wrongdoing."

The allegations were said to relate to incidents back in 2014.
description: Tamara is a South African model who lives the ultimate jet-setter lifestyle flying to different destinations to shoot modelling campaigns
